channel.title: History on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in History on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: श्रौतसम्प्रदायाः
item.description: “The AV practitioners are associated with the role of the Brahman but in reality have their own parallel śrauta tradition.” - (MT) “While the YV and SV texts as we have them today clearly postdate and presuppose the core RV, we know from the internal evidence of the RV that there were already YV and SV practitioners alongside the composers of the RV. E.g.: udgāteva śakune sāma gāyasi : You O bird sing a sāman like the udgātṛ.
